text:
- The type of Kaposi sarcoma.    - The general health of the patient, especially the patient's immune system.    - Whether the cancer has just been diagnosed or has recurred (come back).
                                
                
				               Classic Kaposi Sarcoma
							            
							                
							                    Key Points
							                    - Classic Kaposi sarcoma is found most often in older men of Italian or Eastern European Jewish origin.    -
